message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This is a good starting point, and we can adjust in the next round if needed.
I think 70/30 is a more reasonable starting point. Your turn to adjust!
I'm willing to compromise further, but I need more than 30%.  Let's meet in the middle with a 48/52 split.  This gives you a good deal, and still ensures I get something worthwhile after inflation.
